mapper.insert: insert into custom_statistic_snapshot (custom_id, total_fee, total_deposit, update_date) values (#{customId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.select: select custom_id, total_fee, total_deposit, update_date from custom_statistic_snapshot
